entities.name: Scylla
entities.description: A gigantic, armoured, arachnid-like predator beast. It has no concept that the war it was designed to fight ended aeons ago, and continues to tear apart anything that enters into its mountainous domain.

abilities.name: Scythe Attack
abilities.description: Scylla stabs with its forearms attempting to pierce it's prey.

abilities.name: Tail Sweep
abilities.description: Scylla makes one giant sweeping attack with their tail. This hits every target within Medium Range, dealing 3 SP damage on a hit. Targets hit are knocked Prone and gain the Vulnerable Trait.

abilities.name: Climb
abilities.description: Scylla can effortlessly climb over difficult and vertical terrain, rocky surfaces, and other obstacles.

abilities.name: Armour Plating
abilities.description: When Scylla takes damage, instead destroy a layer of Armour Plating and negate all of the damage and any effects.

abilities.name: Ambush Predator
abilities.description: Unless detected, Scylla always acts first in combat.

abilities.name: Titanic Actions
abilities.description: Scylla can take three Titanic Actions, choosing from the options below. Only one Titanic Action may be chosen at a time and only at the end of another Pilot's or NPC's turn. Scylla regains spent Titanic Actions at the start of their turn.
options: Scylla makes a single Scythe Attack. This does not have the Multi-Attack Trait.
Scylla makes a Tail Sweep Attack (Costs 2 Titanic Actions).

entities.name: Power Loader
entities.description: A pneumatically powered heavy loader for moving cargo.

entities.name: Defacer Drone
entities.description: Used for salvaging and crowd control, their distinctive buzzsaw sound has struck fear into many protesters.

entities.name: Irradiated Scorpion
entities.description: Mutated beyond their usual size, they have been known to kill entire camps of wasters.

entities.name: Wastelander
entities.description: Represents the myriad of common denizens of the wastelands.

abilities.name: Salvaging Tools
abilities.description: Can be used for salvaging operations.

entities.name: Waster Mob
entities.description: A mob of wastelanders with improvised weapons.

abilities.name: Salvaging Tools
abilities.description: Can be used for salvaging operations.
